item.title: BA cum DM Executive
item.description: Experience: 0 to 1 years Job Location: Chennai Job Description About Spritle: Exciting handcrafted software for handsfree business operations At Spritle, we build software with top-notch technologies to give solutions for various business problems.

item.title: Business Analyst (Fresher)
item.description: Job Description About the role: We are looking for a Business Analyst who is good in analytical, logical reasoning & communication skills.

item.title: Django Full Stack Developer
item.description: Job Description We are hiring Full Stack Developers who are passionate, self-driven and capable of working in both frontend and backend technologies.

item.title: Node Js Developer
item.description: Job Description Are you an aspiring Node.js Developer who is also good with Frontend and looking for an opportunity to work in a great team and advance your skills?

item.title: Quality Analyst (Fresher)
item.description: ​ Job Description We are looking for a passionate Software tester who has a natural flair for solving complex problems and making life easier for others.

item.title: React js Developer
item.description: Job Description We are looking for a 3 - 4 years experienced JavaScript developer who is proficient with React.

item.title: React Native Developer - iOS/Android Platform
item.description: About job We are looking for a React Native developer interested in building performant mobile apps on both the iOS and Android platforms.

item.title: Ruby on Rails Developer

item.description: Urgently hiring Freshers eligible | 0-1 Years experience preferred Must do - Solve the aptitude challenge once applied.
